thread.title: 'Football Friday' won't air tonight, will return next week
thread.title_full: 'Football Friday' won't air tonight, will return next week

title: 'Football Friday' won't air tonight, will return next week
text:
'Football Friday' won't air tonight, will return next week 
Posted 12:52 p.m. yesterday Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters More on this Schedule and Scores by Date 
Raleigh, N.C. â€” For the first time in years, "Football Friday" with Tom Suiter has been canceled this week due to weather. 
The 30-minute high school football highlights show will return to WRAL-TV on Friday, Oct. 9, at it's usual time of 11:35 p.m. It will also stream live on HighSchoolOT.com and simulcast on Buzz Sports Radio. 
Many games were played on Thursday night and as of 12:45 p.m. only one game was scheduled for Friday. 
This is the first time since 2007 that 'Football Friday' will not air in some capacity. 
Friday's radio broadcast of Millbrook vs. Wake Forest will move to Monday on Buzz Sports Radio. Coverage begins at 6:25 p.m. followed by kickoff at 6:30 p.m. 
Saturday morning's "HighSchoolOT Wrap-Up" show will still air from 9-10 a.m. on 99.9 FM The Fan ESPN Radio.
